about.details:
Incorporated in 1994, Shreeji Translogistics Limited is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company provides logistics and parcel delivery services in India. They offer various types of services which includes Full Truck Load Transport Services, Parcel and Part Truck Load Services/ less than Truck Load (LTL), Import- Export Services and Bonded Trucking Services.

They own and operate a strong fleet of commercial vehicles consisting of 229 owned trucks and more than 500 outsourced trucks. They operate different types of trucks on the basis of design and size along with varying capacities. Their Container Trucks are used for transportation of parcels, while Platform Trucks are mainly used for import export containers, and also for transportation of heavy duty goods like automotive parts and machineries

They serve a broad range of industries, including the fast moving consumer goods (FMCG), white goods, food, textiles and apparel, furniture and fixture, pharmaceutical, plastics and metal. They have in-house preventive maintenance as well as annual maintenance contracts (AMC) with TATA Motors and Ashok Leyland for regular maintenance of the vehicles.

contactDetails.full_address: Shreeji Translogistics Ltd, Shreeji Krupa, Plot No. 107 Sector No. 19C, Vashi Navi Mumbai - 400 705

faqs.question: What is the Shreeji Translogistics IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shreeji Translogistics IPO is a SME IPO of 954000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.40 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹130 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on September 29, 2017, and closes on October 5, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shreeji Translogistics IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shreeji Translogistics IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shreeji Translogistics IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shreeji Translogistics IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shreeji Translogistics IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shreeji Translogistics IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shreeji Translogistics IPO opens on September 29, 2017 and closes on October 5, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shreeji Translogistics IPO?
faqs.answer: Shreeji Translogistics IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,30,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shreeji Translogistics IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shreeji Translogistics IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
